channel.title: [PI] How do i make a specific area Pvp [PI] Paying RSGP!
channel.description:
So im using insanityx source and client, i wanted to know how to make the whole of edgeville pvp? Im not a very good coder, but i am willing to pay someone who can help me? i have got team veiwer, skype and msn!
If you know how to do this, i will pay!
Msn & Skype email - dale.nuttall@hotmail.co.uk
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] How do i make a specific area Pvp [PI] Paying RSGP!
item.dc:creator: @Dale12 Dale12
item.description:
@Dale12 wrote:

I dont have a clue what i supposed to change, that says fun pk? i would get errors when i remove?
And also, i tried to add this into client.java … this makes it pvp but doesnt actually let me attack anyone?

if(isInEdge()){ int modY = absY > 3502 ? absY - 3088 : absY; wildLevel = 12; headIconPk = 1; getPA().walkableInterface(197); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if(inMulti()) { HighAndLow(); } else { HighAndLow();

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do i make a specific area Pvp [PI] Paying RSGP!

item.title: [PI] How do i make a specific area Pvp [PI] Paying RSGP!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Dale12, post:5, topic:437393”]This is the only method i can find that has anything to do with the wild tbh, but this is fun pk, Your method, isnt there… theres no such thing -.-

public boolean inWild() {
if(isInFala() || inFunPk()) {
return true;
}
if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3968 ||
absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10367){
return true;
}
return false;
}[/quote]

For the love of god, use code tags.

Read full topic

That’s the exact method… Re-read it.

First line:

public boolean inWild() {

So, it’s inWild, not isWild. My apologies, nonetheless, that’s the method you edit.

item.title: [PI] How do i make a specific area Pvp [PI] Paying RSGP!
item.dc:creator: @Dale12 Dale12
item.description:
@Dale12 wrote:

This is the only method i can find that has anything to do with the wild tbh, but this is fun pk, Your method, isnt there… theres no such thing -.-

public boolean inWild() {
if(isInFala() || inFunPk()) {
return true;
}
if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3968 ||
absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10367){
return true;
}
return false;
}
